issue.subject: File header content
issue.description:
Files header are supposed to be : 
/**
 * @version     4.0.0
 * @package     com_easysdi_[component]
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community  - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
But : - some files present other headers with developer name and no reference to project... - version must be upgraded to 4.3.x

details.name: description
details.old_value:
Files header are supposed to be : 
/**
 * @version     4.0.0
 * @package     com_easysdi_shop
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community  - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
But : - some files present other headers with developer name and no reference to project... - version must be upgraded to 4.3.x
details.new_value:
Files header are supposed to be : 
/**
 * @version     4.0.0
 * @package     com_easysdi_[component]
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community  - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
But : - some files present other headers with developer name and no reference to project... - version must be upgraded to 4.3.x

journals.notes:
File header should be ; 
/**
 * @version     4.x.x
 * @package     com_easysdi_[component]
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013-2015. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 3 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community  - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
LICENCE.txt : file is missing, should be added at the root administrator rep. An automatic update of the headers should be add to the continious integration.
